title: Integrated Plugin Architecture Plan
body_html:
Integrated Plugin Architecture Plan

Components

  • server-plugins/webhook: plugin definition (resources/functions)
  • server-plugins/webhook-resources: triggers, API, delivery service
  • models/webhook: data models & indices

Data Flow

  1. Tx occurs (create/update/delete)
  2. Trigger evaluates filters and emits WebhookEvent
  3. Delivery service picks up event, signs & POSTs
  4. Result recorded; retries scheduled on failure

Indices

  • WebhookConfig: space, enabled
  • WebhookEvent: status, nextRetry, webhookConfig
  • DeliveryAttempt: webhookEvent, attemptedAt

Extensibility

  • Event mappers per class
  • Pluggable delivery backends (HTTP, queue)

Component Map (Diagram)

flowchart TD
  subgraph Plugin
    TRG[Triggers]
    API[API Router]
    DSV[Delivery Service]
    UTIL[Utils]
  end
  subgraph Models
    CFG[WebhookConfig]
    EVT[WebhookEvent]
    ATT[DeliveryAttempt]
  end
  TRG --> EVT
  API --> CFG
  DSV --> ATT
  EVT --> DSV
